bug.author: llhe
bug.summary: Document "How to adding new customized file system"
bug.description: Adding customized file system is supported but not well documented: TF_INC=$(python -c 'import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.sysconfig.get_include())') g++ -std=c++11 -shared test_file_system.cc -o test_file_system.so -fPIC -I $TF_INC Adding a section in how_tos will help.

comments.comment: Could you clarify the context of the problem and its solution?
It is still being worked on, when it is ready we will document it.
Closing this due to inactivity. Feel free to open a new github issue if the problem still persists in recent versions.
